case.title: Beautiful lady looking for LTR marriage 39 - 39 (london)
case.text: Hi, Thanks for reading my post. Basically I like all the norm staying in, going out, movies, keeping fit and shoes. Looking for a gentleman preferably over forty, own hair and teeth, financially sound as well as mentally sound who is looking to settle down possibly marriage if we hit it off.. obviously. I'm pretty and everything is the right size and in the right place. Dark Exotic looks. Get in touch if you want the same. Pictures please lexi
